nodes.text: Marble was a rock used in the construction of buildings.
Types of marble included Durosian marble, Selonian marble and Wayland marble.
Companies that provided marble included Ralltiir Consolidated Marble and XwiziMarble.
The royal Fountain Palace on Hapes was built with marble hallways.
Marble mosaic was found in Sith Temple on Kesh.
Lovolan created their own version of the Hesperidium R-10 household droid, which they did with black marble.
